roleset.name: to upset, disturb
roleset.note: AGITATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from agitate.01-v)
AGITATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with agitate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from agitation.01-n)
AGITATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from agitated.01-j)

example.name: transitive
example.text: It 's not so much the idea of acquisitions [*ICH*-2] that [*T*-1]has agitated the cosmetics industry as the companies doing the acquiring : P & G and Unilever bring with them great experience with mundane products like soap and toilet paper , [*-3] sparking disdain in the glitzy cosmetics trade ; but they also bring mammoth marketing clout , [*] sparking fear .

example.name: Both Args
example.text: Benny's agitation over the cancellation of St. Elmo's Fire lead him to break a shelf full of snow globes.
example.arg: over the cancellation of St. Elmo's Fire

example.name: arg1
example.text: Over the last 24 - hours Mr. Thomas was less agitated .
